adHeader: Professional landscaping & yard maintenance at competitive prices!
adDetails: If you have an outdoor space or yard and are in need of maintenance, we are the ones to call. We specilize in all types of landscaping services and yard maintenance including: * Lawn maintenance (cutting of grass and edges) * Trimming bushes, removing weeds * Tree cutting and removal * Planting flowers, arrange displays * Lawn construction, insulation, fence work, and much more!!!! Free estimates are available seven days a week. Reasonable prices and excellent, professional service. Available to work in the greater Bay Area, including the local Valley Area. Please call Bautista Landscaping at show contact info thank you
